home.title: Comprehensive Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder Evaluation
home.sub-title: Welcome to your personal PTSD self-assessment tool. This test, designed by mental health professionals, provides a confidential space to help you understand potential PTSD symptoms. Remember, this isn't a substitute for professional advice. If you're struggling, seek immediate help from a healthcare provider.

general-test-result.title: Result of the Comprehensive PTSD evaluation
